column4: Morph OS:Has a built-in tracker and announcement service

column1: Opentracker:C:[[Beerware]]:yes:yes (IPv4 and IPv6 have separate binaries and processes that do not share any information between them. If a client communicates to the tracker over IPv6
column2: it will only receive IPv6 addresses in the response.):Unix-like (source code only):Uses libowfat
column3: performs well even on embedded hardware. Only requirement is a POSIX compliant OS. Supports only a compact peer list.

column1: PeerTracker:PHP:[[GPL]]:yes::Web application:Extremely lightweight and efficient BitTorrent tracker. Supports SQLite3
